name: Celephaïs
description:
In a dream Kuranes saw the city in the valley, and the sea-coast beyond, and the snowy peak overlooking the sea, and the painted galleys that sail out of the harbour toward the distant regions where the sea meets the sky...

Take a sleepwalk through the land of dreams, and look back through the ivory gates into that world of wonder which was ours before we were wise and unhappy.

A 2D narrative side-scroller inspired by H.P. Lovecraft's short story "Celephaïs".

All artwork, sound, and music created by me.

Make sure to use headphones or earphones.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Interact - E

Narrative - Space
